snippet: Many stocks rose after the federal report on December sales came in stronger that predicted, though Apple declined again, losing 3.2 percent on Tuesday.
abstract: Wall Street edges higher after retail data comes in stronger than projected, although tech heavyweight Apple drags on the market for a third day.
lead_paragraph: Many stocks rose after the federal report on December sales came in stronger that predicted, though Apple declined again, losing 3.2 percent on Tuesday.
